/* Product - productList */ select p_code, p_name, p_inventory, p_color, p_size, to_char(p_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as p_date, p_gender from product inner join price on product.pr_no = price.pr_no inner join smallcategory on product.smallct_no = smallcategory.smallct_no
order by p_code desc
